tutorial.description: Before donating plasma, it's crucial to familiarize yourself with the donation process, associated risks, and your obligations as a donor. Please take the time to go through the information on this page before making your first donation. If you cannot donate at the center on the same day you review this material, you will need to revisit the information again prior to donating.
